scripts.build:local: bun run build && cp dist/agent-os ~/agent-os/cli && echo 'Binary copied to ~/agent-os/cli'
scripts.build:all-platforms: bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile dist/agent-os-macos-arm64 && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile dist/agent-os-macos-x64 && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/agent-os-linux-x64 && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile dist/agent-os-windows-x64.exe
